name: In Your Nightmare
description:
In Your Nightmare is a procedurally generated Maze (Computer generated maze),were you experience one of my nightmare.

You will be chased by a ghost and you needed to out run the ghost sounds easy right ;) try it.

This isn't the same maze each time the maze will vary that's why it is procedurally generated ;)

----WARNING---

This is only a prototype for game jam ,there will be lot's of BUG'S if you find these bugs please kindly RETRY form Main Menu.
